snippet.title: Nelson and the Magic Cauldron, Trailer, Gameplay, English
snippet.description: Nelson and the Magic Cauldron is a 2D classic Point & Click Adventure and will be released soon for Windows, Mac and Linux. A mobile version could be possible. The game will be released on 22th November 2018. Check out the developer blog for more information.
